ItemBGDesc: Together with this visor, the twisted wish of a Guardian also lies broken. She had wanted to find a way out for her people to escape the Everwinter, but ended up becoming a puppet of a consciousness beyond her. "Supreme Guardian, the title passed down to generations of Belobog's rulers, the one who looked after all the people â€” It never occurred to anyone that the Guardians themselves also long for care and protection."
